meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Poland.
meanings.sent1: In Poland, you can buy many things with a zloty.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for zloty at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The zloty rolled off the table and into the piggy bank.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a zloty to him.
meanings.sent5: The shiny zloty sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A gold coin formerly used in Poland.
meanings.sent1: My grandfather showed me a zloty from his collection.
meanings.sent2: The antique shop had a display of old zloty coins.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a zloty out of my ear during the show.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like finding a rare zloty in a haystack.
meanings.sent5: The zloty gleamed with history and tradition.
